title: Cindy Li
text:
Hi! I’m Cindy. Welcome to my page of projects!
I am a Data Analyst based in NYC currently pursuing my Master’s in Business Analytics with a concentration in Data Analysis.


A little about me…

I’ve lived in 3 countries.
I previously worked at Bank of America as a Technology Analyst designing data pipelines, collaborating with both technical and non-technical teams globally.
I got my bachelor’s from Boston College, majoring in Management Information Systems and Business Analytics, with a minor in Computer Science.
I’m a Swiftie! Taylor Swift follows me on tumblr.
I love to sew so I am passionate about sustainable fashion and how technology can reduce the environmental/social impacts of the fashion industry.



Currently learning:

R (Software Tools for Data Analysis)
Python (Programming for Analytics)
SQL (Principles of Database Management Systems)
Salsa & bachata


Let’s Connect!
